## ErrorXActionNotify type

Action to display notifications in specified UI targets. Used to notify applications to handle error messages through the indicated display mechanisms.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ErrorXActionNotify = {
    action: 'notify';
    targets: string[];
    [key: string]: any;
};
```

## Example


```typescript
{
  action: 'notify',
  targets: ['toast', 'custom-sidebar'],
  title: 'Error occurred',
  duration: 5000
}
```
